title: Bill Signed: H.R. 3076 | The White House
content: On Wednesday, April 6, 2022, the President signed into law:H.R. 3076, the “Postal Service Reform Act of 2022,” which establishes the Postal Service Health Benefits Program, repeals the prefunding requirement related to Postal retirement benefits, makes reforms to nonpostal and postal services, among other things.Thank you to Representatives Carolyn Maloney, James Comer, Virginia Foxx, Gerry Connolly, and Brenda Lawrence and Senators Gary Peters, Rob Portman, Tom Carper, Thom Tillis, and many others, for their leadership.
